entry.title: The Convertible Mini Weekender in Grey
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 88.00

Description

Introducing the mini to our original Weekender, but better, because this lady has a bottom compartment that zips off completely! Same amount of function packed into a smaller silhouette! A bottom compartment that completely zips off so that this bag can go from Carry-On to Cocktails with just little zip zip zip!
Specifications

Dims: 16"W x 16"H x 8"D
Material: Body - Cotton/Polyester
Trim - PU
Strap - Polyester
Lining - Polyester
Care: Spot Clean
Weight: 3.4lbs
Details

EXTERIOR
Rolled shoulder straps for easy carry, adjustable-removable shoulder/crossbody strap
Wire frame double zip opening/closure, opens wide to see inside
Double zip removable bottom compartment with water resistant lining
Trolley pass through with zipper, to create pocket when not in use
External zip pocket for small items

INTERIOR
Padded laptop sleeve pocket with Velcro strap closure
Large zip pocket and two small slip pockets
Lined with durable, easy to wipe clean, polyester, water-resistant lining
Key-ring strap with dog clip to attach keys for quick access
 
PERFECT FOR
Day Trips
Easy Overnights
Work Days
Gym Stuff
Mom Life
Carry-On

entry.title: The Weekender in Grey
entry.summary:
Vendor: Beach House Group
Type: Shopping Totes
Price: 98.00

Description

We designed this bag to take the hassle out of packing for the weekend or whichever days you’re away. Seriously, this tote’s easy-access opening makes getting everything in and out a breeze (no flashlight required). Plus, the bottom compartment is designed to keep your shoes, toiletries and travel essentials separate—you can even stash a hair dryer in there. Bonus points: there’s a zipper-pocket on the back that becomes a trolley sleeve so it fits over your luggage handle. Hello, carry-on.

 
Specifications

Dims: 19"W x 10"D x 16"H
Material: Body - Cotton/Polyester, Trim - PVC, Strap - Polyester, Lining - Polyester
Care: Spot Clean
Weight : 3.86lbs
Details

EXTERIOR
durable canvas (beige) OR polyester (black) material featuring easy to wipe clean faux patent trim
12" drop partially rolled handle for easy carry
wire frame double zip opening/closure - opens wide to see inside
double zip around bottom compartment with water resistant lining
trolley pass through with zipper - to create pocket when not in use
external zip pocket for small items (keys, phone, boarding pass, passport, sunnies, lip gloss)
embossed BÉIS logo on bottom left
INTERIOR
padded laptop sleeve pocket with velcro strap closure
large zip pocket and two small slip pockets
lined with durable, easy to wipe clean, polyester, water-resistant lining
key-ring strap with dog clip to attach keys for quick access
PERFECT FOR
Travel
Luggage Storage
Protecting your luggage

entry.title: The Sport Duffle in Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 88.00

Description
The ultimate in gym duffles! With handles to easily grab, a padded crossbody and shoulder strap for the long haul, stow-away padded backpack straps and a trolley sleeve to slip over your luggage handle for when you're really on-the-go - this bag was made to move with you, in literally every way! Designed to fit perfectly in a gym locker but so good looking you'll never want to hide it away!

 
Specifications

Dims: 10"H x 17"W x 8.5"D
Materials: Exterior - Wrinkle Nylon, Interior - Recycled Poly
Care: Spot Clean, Lay Flat to Dry

 
Details

DETAILS:
Compact duffle shape - sized perfectly to fit into a gym locker
4 ways to carry
hand-held straps with wrap
Removable & adjustable padded shoulder strap for shoulder of crossbody carry
EXTERIOR
Hidden padded backpack straps on bottom
Branded padded pull handle to easily grab and go or hang from a locker hook
Side elasticized slip pocket
Front cargo zip pocket
Trolley sleeve with zipper - so you can use as slip pocket when not traveling
Exterior quick-access zip pocket for fun at top seam
INTERIOR
2 large elasticized slip pocket
1 large zip pocket
2 mesh zip pockets
Included is a ‘DIRT BAG’ for dirty clothing, shoes, etc.

How you can move with this product
Perfect gym bag - sized to fit into gym lockers
On-the-go - multi ways to carry

entry.title: The Sport Pack in Beige
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 44.00

Description
Anyone can design a fanny pack - but this one is a little different. We designed this bag with the hikers in mind. Fits snug to the body with easy access to anything you might need, super light weight and extra d-rings to hook on all the extras. We've also included a handy strap to secure your water bottle to! The bonus paracord is great when you need to repel out of any situation but we personally think it just looks really cool.

 
Specifications

Dims: 6"H x 16"W x 4"D
Materials: Exterior - Wrinkle Nylon, Interior - Recycled Poly
Care: Spot Clean, Lay Flat to Dry

 
Details

DETAILS:
Sleek - body hugging fanny pack
2 ways to carry
Around waist
As a sling/crossbody
EXTERIOR
Adjustable strap to wear multiple ways and tighten for a close fit
2 small d-rings - and 1 large d-ring to hang keys, water bottle, carabiner
extra web loop to secure most water bottle to straps
Body-side zip pocket
Braided paracord - just in case you get caught in need of a rope
INTERIOR
Double zip opening - open and close easily no matter what side you wear your bag on
Key-leash to easily locate keys or clip to any pouch with a d-ring
Zip pocket with 3 CC slips

How you can move with this product
On-the-go - hike, bike, walk, run, skip, jump, skate

entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 54.00

Description
If you know us, you know we can never create a bag that can only do one thing! This tote, backpack, yoga mat carrying, tennis racket fitting bag is absolutely no exception. Designed to be your go-to bag when your moving around, light trips to the gyms or a trip to your local yoga studio The Sport Tote will be your go to bag when you're on-the-move!

Materials: Exterior - Wrinkle Nylon, Interior - Recycled Poly
Care: Spot Clean, Lay Flat to Dry

DETAILS:
Simple - multi-wear and multi-use tote
2 ways to carry
As tote with webbing straps

Drawstring & cord lock closure

entry.title: The Pumping Backpack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type: Diaper Bag
Price: 88.00

Description
Believe it or not, the BEIS office is no stranger to the whirring sound of a breast pump. We are pretty open about our needs when it comes to how we tote around our stuff and the need to have a place to stash your breast pump was not lost on this team! The genius lies in the fact that this doubles as Mama's work bag, comes with a removable pouch for storing parts, keeping them separate, easy to grab and clean as well as the bonus of not looking like you're carrying around a glorified milk-machine! We've added an insulated compartment in this backpack to easily and safely get that liquid gold from point A to point B.
Specifications
Dims: 14" W x 16" H x 7" D
Materials: Body: Nylon Twill, Trim: Buffalo PU, Jelly PVC (Pouch), Lining: 100% Poly, Hardware: Zinc Alloy
Care: Spot Clean
Weight: 2.5lbs

 
Details
EXTERIOR
- compartment specifically for your pump ( fit's most pumps)- with a zipper opening
to feed tubes through on the exterior and an opening to feed the power cord through
- padded shoulder straps
- top handles - easy to grab and go
- 4 exterior slip pockets
- trolley sleeve
INTERIOR
- interior zip pocket
- padded laptop sleeve
- 2 interior slip pockets
- comes with water proof zip pouch
PERFECT FOR
-Baby Needs
-Travel
-Work Tote
-Carry-on

entry.title: The Work Tote in Cognac Croc
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type: The Work Tote
Price: 128.00

Description

OOO?!? No worries, you'll never be too far from paradise or your email with this on-the-go mobile office in a tote bag, bag! We designed this bag (selfishly) because there was not one good-looking bag on the market that we felt just as good carrying to work, to after work cocktails and to all of our out-of-office adventures. This chic tote packs in ALL the function, no detail was left out!

Dims: 16.75"W x 13.5"H x 7"D Materials: Exterior - Croc Embossed Vegan Leather

Laptop Sleeve: 13.5"W x 11"H

Lining - 100% Polyester Hardware - Zinc Alloy

Care: Spot Clean

Weight: 2.86lbs
Details

Flat shoulder straps & removable, adjustable poly shoulder strap
Full zip closure
Trolley pass through with zipper, to create pocket when not in use and extra zip pocket on top
1 exterior slip pocket, 1 exterior zip pocket
INTERIOR
Removable interior zip pouch
Padded laptop sleeve pocket with Velcro strap closure 13.5"W x 11"H
Large zip pocket
Two small slip pockets & pen slips
Key-ring leash with dog clip to attach keys for quick access
PERFECT FOR
Everyday
Work Days
Weekends
Carry-On

entry.title: The Puffer Duffle in Black
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 98.00

Description
If you're looking for a new winter shoulder bag that can carry all of your winter essentials effortlessly, you've found the perfect product. The Black Puffer Tote from BÉIS is a chic handbag that converges fashion and functionality to make the perfect sized edition to our tote collection and a purchase you won't regret. The Puffer Tote comes equipped with a water-resistant bottom compartment for all your wet ski gear, a padded laptop sleeve, and a hidden cell phone pocket, making winter adventures a piece of cake! 

 
Specifications

Dims: 19.75"W x 11.75"H x 11.75"D
Materials: Body: 100% polyester fabric
Trim: 100% saffiano PU
Lining 1: 100% 210D polyester
Lining 2: waterproof lining
Care: Spot clean
Weight: 2.4

 
Details
EXTERIOR
- Faux Saffiano Leather Trim
- Lightweight 'puffed' poly fabric body
- 1 exterior side slip pocket
- 1 front zipper pocket
- trolley sleeve
- Hand held straps
- Removable/Interchangeable adjustable strap
- Separate zipped shoe compartment

INTERIOR
- Key Fob
- Padded Laptop sleeve (fits up to a 13" macbook pro)
- 1 large clear zip pocket
- 3 mesh zip pockets
- Elasticized water bottle pocket

PERFECT FOR
Everyday
Work Days
Gym
Travel
Weekends
Carry-On

entry.title: The Puffer Tote in Beige
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 78.00

Description
Gear up for the winter season with The Puffy Tote. This perfect sized edition to our tote collection comes with all the winter fun necessities, including a water resistant bottom compartment for all your wet ski gear (or bathing suit if you’re not a snow bunny), a padded laptop sleeve and a hidden cell phone pocket - so documenting your adventures is never a task of hide & seek.

 
Shay's Inspo

“To me, this bag exemplifies the fabrication and highlights everything I love about this style. It’s perfectly shaped, sized and has features galore on the inside, too, to make it just as functional and is it fashionable.” — Shay

 
Details
PUFFED UP!
Cozy winter vibes - ready for your ski adventure
WATER RESISTANT BOTTOM COMPARTMENT
For your hat & gloves, shoes or bathing suit!
ADJUSTABLE, REMOVABLE SHOULDER STRAP
Multiple ways to carry
HIDDEN EXTERNAL POCKET
Because: phone & keys.
PADDED LAPTOP SLEEVE
Fits up to 15” laptop
TROLLEY PASSTHROUGH
Plays nice with roller bags.

entry.title: E-Gift Card
entry.summary:
Vendor: Rise.ai
Type:
Price: 25.00 - 500.00 (7 variants)

Shopping for someone else but not sure what to give them? Give them the gift of choice with a gift card.
Gift cards are delivered by email and contain instructions to redeem them at checkout. Our gift cards have no additional processing fees.

entry.title: The Backpack Diaper Bag
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type: Diaper Bag
Price: 138.00

Description

The anti-diaper diaper bag backpack is the perfect accessory with enough function to tote around all your baby-mama needs and chic enough that NO ONE will ever suspect that you're carrying around a week-old dirty diaper! Complete with every essential needed for that dreaded diaper change; a changing pad with a diaper and baby wipes pocket, an odor-proof pouch, a teething ring to keep the babe from squirming, and a pacifier pouch to easily reach that must-have baby plug! These diaper bag backpacks are the ultimate lifesaver for any busy mom that's always on the go.
Specifications

Dims: 12" W x 15" H x 7.75" D
Materials:
Body: Nylon Twill
Trim: Buffalo PU,
Jelly PVC (Accessories)
Silicone (Teething Ring)
Lining: 100% Poly
Zinc Alloy Hardware
Care: Spot Clean
Weight: 4lbs
Details

EXTERIOR
- 5 Exterior pockets(2 slips, 2 slips with magnetic closure, 1 zip) (one pocket to hold changing pad)
- Trolley sleeve with option to use as a zip pocket
- Removable/Interchangeable padded shoulder strap
- Removable/Interchangeable padded chain strap
- Removable/Interchangeable adjustable strap with shoulder pad
- Breakaway zipper for easy access to interior
- Snaps on sides to reduce/expand size
- Metal feet on bottom to protect from wear & tear
INTERIOR
- Removable stroller straps
- Tabs for stroller caddy (sold separately)
- Key Fob
- Pacifier pouch included
- Odor Proof bag (for dirty diapers/clothing)
- Portable changing pad with slip pocket for diapers & wipes
- Teething ring
- Insulated drawstring pocket for bottles
- Padded Laptop sleeve with magnetic closure 12" W x 13" H; fits most 16" laptops
- 2 large slip pockets
- 1 large zip pocket

entry.title: The Mini Work Tote in Cognac Croc
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:

Description

Remember when you said The Work Tote was too big, well enter it's mini-me. The Mini Work Tote is just like this original in a more compact silhouette, it's like a tiny house, if a house could be an on-the-go mobile office in a tote bag! We designed the original because there was not one good-looking bag on the market that we felt just as good carrying to work, to after work cocktails and to all of our out-of-office adventures. This version was designed for you, by you! This chic tote packs in ALL the function, no detail was left out!

entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:

Description

Did you ever just want a bag that could do it all?! Something so modular in design that it could literally suit your every need and keep your hands free to text, hold a beverage, do cartwheels?!? Welp, here it is, a backpack with a removable front pouch that with the clip of a strap becomes a crossbody or acts as a seat back organizer when you are on the go! We know, we should have named this the everyday, everything, everywhere bag....

Materials: Body - Faux Leather/PU Lining - Polyester Strap - Faux Leather/PU Care: Spot Clean

Did you know some people pack light?! If you are a fan of this brand you know we love a big bag, but some people are just so good they know how to get by with just the right amount of items, only the essentials - that's why and how this black messenger bag was created. entry.title: The Mini Work Tote in Black Croc
entry.summary:
Vendor: Béis Travel
Type:
Price: 108.00

Description

Remember when you said The Work Tote was too big, well enter it's mini-me. The Mini Work Tote is just like the original in a more compact silhouette, it's like a tiny house, if a house could be an on-the-go mobile office in a tote bag! We designed the original because there was not one good-looking bag on the market that we felt just as good carrying to work, to after work cocktails and to all our out-of-office adventures. This version was designed for you, by you! This chic tote packs in ALL the function, no detail was left out!
